SELECT SI_REMARKS.SI_REMARKS_ID ,
SI_REMARKS.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_REMARKS.REMARKS_NAME, SI_REMARKS.REMARKS_DATE, SI_REMARKS.REMARKS,
SI_REMARKS.DELETE_FLAG , SI_REMARKS.SEND_FLAG , SI_REMARKS.VESSEL_ID , SI_REMARKS.DATA_NO , SI_REMARKS.USER_KEY , SI_REMARKS.RENEW_DATE , SI_REMARKS.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_REMARKS.TS
FROM SI_REMARKS
WHERE SI_REMARKS.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO SI_REMARKS( SI_REMARKS_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ID ,
REMARKS_NAME, REMARKS_DATE, REMARKS,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_REMARKS_ID ,
:MS_SENIN_ID ,
:REMARKS_NAME, :REMARKS_DATE, :REMARKS,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_REMARKS SET MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID ,
REMARKS_NAME = :REMARKS_NAME, REMARKS_DATE = :REMARKS_DATE, REMARKS = :REMARKS,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_REMARKS_ID = :SI_REMARKS_ID AND TS = :TS
